seo.title: ONE DAY Tattoo Studio London | Same-Day Custom Tattoos
seo.description: Premium same-day tattoo service in London. Custom designs, walk-in friendly, professional artists. Book your one-day tattoo experience today.

openGraph.title: ONE DAY Tattoo Studio London - Your Dream Tattoo Today

headline: Your Dream Tattoo,
Completed Today
hero.subheadline: London's premier same-day tattoo studio. Walk in with an idea, leave with incredible ink.
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist working on a detailed custom design

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece completed in a single session, crafted with precision and passion

sessions.subtitle: From quick flash pieces to detailed custom work - all completed the same day

testimonials.quote: Walked in with a rough idea, left with the most incredible tattoo. Marcus understood exactly what I wanted and delivered beyond expectations.
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

testimonials.quote: The one-day concept is brilliant. No waiting weeks for appointments - just quality work done right when you want it. Highly recommend!
testimonials.author: James R.

paragraphs: With over 8 years of experience in the London tattoo scene, Marcus founded ONE DAY with a simple mission: make incredible tattoos accessible without the long waits. Having trained under some of the UK's most respected artists, he specializes in creating detailed custom pieces that can be completed in a single session.

Marcus believes that great tattoos shouldn't require months of planning and multiple appointments. His efficient workflow and artistic expertise allow him to deliver museum-quality work in record time, whether you're looking for a simple flash piece or an intricate custom design.
about.callout: Every tattoo tells a story - let's write yours today.
about.imageAlt: Marcus Chen, lead tattoo artist at ONE DAY Tattoo Studio London

items.question: Do you really complete tattoos in one day?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our studio is specifically designed for same-day completion. We assess each design during consultation to ensure it can be finished in your chosen session length. For larger pieces, we offer full-day sessions up to 8 hours.

items.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
items.answer: Yes! We welcome walk-ins for our Express Sessions (1-3 hours). For Full Day Sessions, we recommend booking in advance to guarantee availability. Our goal is to be as accessible as possible while maintaining quality.

finalCta.headline: Ready for Your Same-Day Tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: Don't wait weeks for your next tattoo. Book today and leave with incredible ink.

booking.modalDescription: Choose your preferred session type and let us know about your design idea. We'll confirm availability and get you inked today!
booking.successMessage: We'll contact you within 30 minutes to confirm your same-day appointment. Get ready for some incredible ink!
booking.depositDisclaimer: £50 deposit required to secure booking, applied to final cost

footer.tagline: Your dream tattoo, completed in one day
